entries.title: Asus upgrades the Zenbook 14X with Raptor Lake CPUs and faster refresh rate
entries.description: The 2023 Zenbook 14X makes a few notable improvements.

entries.title: The refreshed MSI Titan GT77 gaming notebook has a 4K 144Hz Mini LED display
entries.description: It's really bright and very colorful.

entries.title: The wireless TV future is now? Displace shows off a 55-inch, 20 pound TV.
entries.description: It sounds too good to be true, but this wireless TV is supposed to be released in late 2023.

entries.title: TCL RayNeo X2 hands-on: Maybe the world is ready for Google Glass now?
entries.description: There are some really useful features of these AR glasses.

entries.title: Samsung’s new SmartThings Station is a hub, smart button, and wireless charger
entries.description: Samsung is reviving its efforts at first-party SmartThings hubs.

entries.title: TCL launches 40 series phones with some coming to North America soon
entries.description: Budget phone shoppers will need to keep an eye on the 40 series.

entries.title: TCL splits its 2023 smart TVs into two distinct lines
entries.description: There's a new TCL TV for any budget in 2023.

entries.title: TCL Nxtpaper Phone Concept hands-on: I’m in love
entries.description: Imagine an Amazon Kindle mashed with a OnePlus One and a Pixel 5. Yeah, I'd buy that.

entries.title: Android will officially support the RISC-V architecture, and that’s a big deal
entries.description: The Arm architecture powers virtually all phones today, but a rival architecture has gained Google's attention.

entries.title: Asus Chromebook Vibe CX34 Flip is all about cloud gaming at CES 2023
entries.description: It even comes with free GeForce Now time.

entries.title: Does Qi2 mean MagSafe is coming to Android?
entries.description: A new standard to solve previous standard problems. Where have we heard this one before?

entries.title: Garmin Dash Cam Live announced: Ever wanted a dash cam with LTE?
entries.description: Who says you need Wi-Fi or a microSD card slot to quickly view footage?

entries.title: CES 2023: You probably can’t afford LG’s latest TVs
entries.description: LG's 136-inch micro-LED TV will set you back $250,000, while its new OLED TV costs $25,000.

entries.title: Citizen’s new smartwatch uses NASA technology to help you reduce fatigue
entries.description: Citizen's new smartwatch is expected to go on sale in March.

entries.title: Eve’s newest smart home devices are launching with Matter out of the box
entries.description: They're iterations on existing products, but early pioneers in the Matter space.

entries.title: The Samsung Galaxy A14 5G has a big screen and a small price
entries.description: At under $200, budget shoppers shouldn't skip this one.

entries.title: Wallpaper Wednesday: More great phone wallpapers for all to share (Jan. 4)
entries.description: Here is a weekly selection of Android wallpapers created by our readers and members of the Android Authority team!

entries.title: This new robot vacuum wants you to forget about cleaning, really.
entries.description: The ultimate home cleaning solution?

entries.title: Roku to sell its own smart TVs this spring with Roku OLED TVs coming later
entries.description: You will be able to get Roku-branded TVs up to 75 inches in size.

entries.title: This dashcam of your dreams comes with T-Mobile connectivity and AI smarts
entries.description: The Nextbase IQ could be the ultimate road safety gadget for your car.

entries.title: HP reveals the DragonFly Pro in Windows and Chromebook flavors
entries.description: HP wants the Dragonfly Pro to be the computer for freelancers.

entries.title: The Dell UltraSharp 6K Monitor could rival LG and Apple’s best
entries.description: Expect IPS Black technology, a 4K HDR webcam, and plenty of ports.

entries.title: What is the Google Home app and how to use it
entries.description: Learn how to get the most out of your smart home devices, especially if you like to use the Google ecosystem.

entries.title: You can now buy a wearable sleep tracker for your baby
entries.description: Understand your infant's snoozing habits.

entries.title: Daily Authority: 📱 OnePlus 11 goes official, Pixel 7a leaks on video, and more
entries.description: The OnePlus 11 launch, Pixel 7a video leak, and lots more from CES 2023.

entries.title: OnePlus 11 is officially here but you’ll have to wait another month to get it
entries.description: The new flagship killer?

entries.title: This new Withings device wants your pee!
entries.description: Forget cups and sticks, the U-Scan offers instant analysis.

entries.title: Samsung announces brand new Freestyle projector at CES 2023
entries.description: Stream Netflix, interact with the wall and more.

entries.title: Samsung announces the OLED S95C 4K TV, the perfect display for gamers
entries.description: A 144Hz refresh rate is just the beginning.

entries.title: Valencell announces world’s first calibrationless blood pressure sensor
entries.description: The monitor still has to get FDA clearance.

entries.title: Nanoleaf has a lot of new Matter-powered stuff, and not just shape lights
entries.description: Nanoleaf wants to be your primary choice for smart home products, not just fun lights you stick to the wall.

entries.title: What is an SSL certificate, why is it important and how to get one?
